tier.item: (i) Charti b::k waa khawi hen Nuan
Chart speak say he see Nuan

Chart speak say he see Nuan

Chart speak say he see Nuan
Charti said that hei saw Nuan.

tier.item: (i) Jaan Jein yi naalnish. Doo eii Seelii bi njilnishda.
`John works with Jane. He doesn't work with Sally.'
(i) Jaan Jein yi naalnish. Doo eii Seelii bi njilnishda.
`John works with Jane. He doesn't work with Sally.'
Jaan Jein yi naalnish. Doo eii Seelii bi njilnishda.
John works with Jane. He doesn't work with Sally.
